## createMaterial() function

Create a material, depending on the rendering technique provided in the options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createMaterial(options: MaterialOptions, textureReadyCallback?: (texture: THREE.Texture) => void): THREE.Material | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [MaterialOptions](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.md) | The material options the subsequent functions need. |
|  textureReadyCallback | (texture: THREE.Texture) =&gt; void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

THREE.Material \| undefined

new material instance that matches `technique.name`
